013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
019
020import java.util.*;
021import java.util.TreeMap;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.objecttools.*;
028
029/**
030 * This is the root document object for the OpenAPI specification.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * The OpenAPI Object is the root document that describes an entire API. It contains metadata about the API,
034 * available paths and operations, parameters, responses, authentication methods, and other information.
035 *
036 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
037 * <p>
038 * The OpenAPI Object is composed of the following fields:
039 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
040 *    <li><c>openapi</c> (string, REQUIRED) - The OpenAPI Specification version (e.g., "3.0.0")
041 *    <li><c>info</c> ({@link Info}, REQUIRED) - Provides metadata about the API
042 *    <li><c>servers</c> (array of {@link Server}) - An array of Server Objects providing connectivity information
043 *    <li><c>paths</c> (map of {@link PathItem}) - The available paths and operations for the API
044 *    <li><c>components</c> ({@link Components}) - An element to hold various schemas for reuse
045 *    <li><c>security</c> (array of {@link SecurityRequirement}) - Security mechanisms applied to all operations
046 *    <li><c>tags</c> (array of {@link Tag}) - A list of tags for API documentation control
047 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation
048 * </ul>
049 *
050 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
051 * <p class='bjava'>
052 *    <jc>// Create an OpenAPI document</jc>
053 *    OpenApi <jv>doc</jv> = <jk>new</jk> OpenApi()
054 *       .setOpenapi(<js>"3.0.0"</js>)
055 *       .setInfo(
056 *          <jk>new</jk> Info()
057 *             .setTitle(<js>"My API"</js>)
058 *             .setVersion(<js>"1.0.0"</js>)
059 *       )
060 *       .setPaths(
061 *          JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
062 *             <js>"/pets"</js>, <jk>new</jk> PathItem()
063 *                .setGet(<jk>new</jk> Operation()
064 *                   .setSummary(<js>"List all pets"</js>)
065 *                )
066 *          )
067 *       );
068 * </p>
069 *
070 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
071 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#openapi-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; OpenAPI Object</a>
072 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/basic-structure/">OpenAPI Basic Structure</a>
073 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
074 * </ul>
075 */
076@FluentSetters
077public class OpenApi extends OpenApiElement {
078
079   /** Represents a null OpenAPI document */
080   public static final OpenApi NULL = new OpenApi();
081
082   private static final Comparator<String> PATH_COMPARATOR = (o1, o2) -> o1.replace('{', '@').compareTo(o2.replace('{', '@'));
083
084   private String openapi = "3.0.0";
085   private Info info;
086   private List<Server> servers;
087   private Map<String,PathItem> paths;
088   private Components components;
089   private List<SecurityRequirement> security;
090   private List<Tag> tags;
091   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
092
093   /**
094    * Default constructor.
095    */
096   public OpenApi() {}
097
098   /**
099    * Copy constructor.
100    *
101    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
102    */
103   public OpenApi(OpenApi copyFrom) {
104      super(copyFrom);
105      this.openapi = copyFrom.openapi;
106      this.info = copyFrom.info;
107      this.servers = copyOf(copyFrom.servers);
108      this.paths = copyOf(copyFrom.paths);
109      this.components = copyFrom.components;
110      this.security = copyOf(copyFrom.security);
111      this.tags = copyOf(copyFrom.tags);
112      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs;
113   }
114
115   /**
116    * Make a deep copy of this object.
117    *
118    * @return A deep copy of this object.
119    */
120   public OpenApi copy() {
121      return new OpenApi(this);
122   }
123
124   /**
125    * Returns the OpenAPI version.
126    *
127    * @return The OpenAPI version.
128    */
129   public String getOpenapi() {
130      return openapi;
131   }
132
133   /**
134    * Sets the OpenAPI version.
135    *
136    * @param value The new value for this property.
137    * @return This object.
138    */
139   public OpenApi setOpenapi(String value) {
140      this.openapi = value;
141      return this;
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * Returns the info object.
146    *
147    * @return The info object.
148    */
149   public Info getInfo() {
150      return info;
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Sets the info object.
155    *
156    * @param value The new value for this property.
157    * @return This object.
158    */
159   public OpenApi setInfo(Info value) {
160      this.info = value;
161      return this;
162   }
163
164   /**
165    * Returns the servers list.
166    *
167    * @return The servers list.
168    */
169   public List<Server> getServers() {
170      return servers;
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Sets the servers list.
175    *
176    * @param value The new value for this property.
177    * @return This object.
178    */
179   public OpenApi setServers(List<Server> value) {
180      this.servers = value;
181      return this;
182   }
183
184   /**
185    * Returns the paths map.
186    *
187    * @return The paths map.
188    */
189   public Map<String,PathItem> getPaths() {
190      return paths;
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Sets the paths map.
195    *
196    * @param value The new value for this property.
197    * @return This object.
198    */
199   public OpenApi setPaths(Map<String,PathItem> value) {
200      this.paths = mapBuilder(String.class,PathItem.class).sparse().sorted(PATH_COMPARATOR).addAll(value).build();
201      return this;
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Adds a path to this OpenAPI document.
206    *
207    * @param path The path string.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
208    * @param pathItem The path item.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
209    * @return This object.
210    */
211   public OpenApi addPath(String path, PathItem pathItem) {
212      assertArgNotNull("path", path);
213      assertArgNotNull("pathItem", pathItem);
214      if (paths == null)
215         paths = new TreeMap<>(PATH_COMPARATOR);
216      getPaths().put(path, pathItem);
217      return this;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * Returns the components object.
222    *
223    * @return The components object.
224    */
225   public Components getComponents() {
226      return components;
227   }
228
229   /**
230    * Sets the components object.
231    *
232    * @param value The new value for this property.
233    * @return This object.
234    */
235   public OpenApi setComponents(Components value) {
236      this.components = value;
237      return this;
238   }
239
240   /**
241    * Returns the security requirements list.
242    *
243    * @return The security requirements list.
244    */
245   public List<SecurityRequirement> getSecurity() {
246      return security;
247   }
248
249   /**
250    * Sets the security requirements list.
251    *
252    * @param value The new value for this property.
253    * @return This object.
254    */
255   public OpenApi setSecurity(List<SecurityRequirement> value) {
256      this.security = value;
257      return this;
258   }
259
260   /**
261    * Returns the tags list.
262    *
263    * @return The tags list.
264    */
265   public List<Tag> getTags() {
266      return tags;
267   }
268
269   /**
270    * Sets the tags list.
271    *
272    * @param value The new value for this property.
273    * @return This object.
274    */
275   public OpenApi setTags(List<Tag> value) {
276      this.tags = value;
277      return this;
278   }
279
280   /**
281    * Bean property setter:  <property>tags</property>.
282    *
283    * <p>
284    * A list of tags used by the specification with additional metadata.
285    *
286    * @param value
287    *    The new value for this property.
288    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
289    * @return This object.
290    */
291   public OpenApi setTags(Tag...value) {
292      setTags(listBuilder(Tag.class).sparse().add(value).build());
293      return this;
294   }
295
296   /**
297    * Bean property appender:  <property>tags</property>.
298    *
299    * <p>
300    * A list of tags used by the specification with additional metadata.
301    *
302    * @param values
303    *    The values to add to this property.
304    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
305    * @return This object.
306    */
307   public OpenApi addTags(Tag...values) {
308      tags = listBuilder(tags).sparse().add(values).build();
309      return this;
310   }
311
312   /**
313    * Bean property appender:  <property>tags</property>.
314    *
315    * <p>
316    * A list of tags used by the specification with additional metadata.
317    *
318    * @param values
319    *    The values to add to this property.
320    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
321    * @return This object.
322    */
323   public OpenApi addTags(Collection<Tag> values) {
324      tags = listBuilder(tags).sparse().addAll(values).build();
325      return this;
326   }
327
328   /**
329    * Returns the external documentation.
330    *
331    * @return The external documentation.
332    */
333   public ExternalDocumentation getExternalDocs() {
334      return externalDocs;
335   }
336
337   /**
338    * Sets the external documentation.
339    *
340    * @param value The new value for this property.
341    * @return This object.
342    */
343   public OpenApi setExternalDocs(ExternalDocumentation value) {
344      this.externalDocs = value;
345      return this;
346   }
347
348   /**
349    * Finds a reference within this OpenAPI document.
350    *
351    * @param ref The reference string (e.g., <js>"#/components/schemas/User"</js>).  Must not be <jk>null</jk> or blank.
352    * @param c The expected class type.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
353    * @return The referenced node, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
354    */
355   public <T> T findRef(String ref, Class<T> c) {
356      assertArgNotNullOrBlank("ref", ref);
357      assertArgNotNull("c", c);
358      if (! ref.startsWith("#/"))
359         throw new BasicRuntimeException("Unsupported reference:  ''{0}''", ref);
360      try {
361         return new ObjectRest(this).get(ref.substring(1), c);
362      } catch (Exception e) {
363         throw new BeanRuntimeException(e, c, "Reference ''{0}'' could not be converted to type ''{1}''.", ref, className(c));
364      }
365   }
366
367   @Override
368   public String toString() {
369      return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT.toString(this);
370   }
371
372   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
373   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
374      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
375      return switch (property) {
376         case "openapi" -> toType(getOpenapi(), type);
377         case "info" -> toType(getInfo(), type);
378         case "servers" -> toType(getServers(), type);
379         case "paths" -> toType(getPaths(), type);
380         case "components" -> toType(getComponents(), type);
381         case "security" -> toType(getSecurity(), type);
382         case "tags" -> toType(getTags(), type);
383         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
384         default -> super.get(property, type);
385      };
386   }
387
388   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
389   public OpenApi set(String property, Object value) {
390      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
391      return switch (property) {
392         case "components" -> setComponents(toType(value, Components.class));
393         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
394         case "info" -> setInfo(toType(value, Info.class));
395         case "openapi" -> setOpenapi(Utils.s(value));
396         case "paths" -> setPaths(mapBuilder(String.class, PathItem.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
397         case "security" -> setSecurity(listBuilder(SecurityRequirement.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
398         case "servers" -> setServers(listBuilder(Server.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
399         case "tags" -> setTags(listBuilder(Tag.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
400         default -> {
401            super.set(property, value);
402            yield this;
403         }
404      };
405   }
406
407   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
408   public Set<String> keySet() {
409      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
410         .addIf(components != null, "components")
411         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
412         .addIf(info != null, "info")
413         .addIf(openapi != null, "openapi")
414         .addIf(paths != null, "paths")
415         .addIf(security != null, "security")
416         .addIf(servers != null, "servers")
417         .addIf(tags != null, "tags")
418         .build();
419      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
420   }
421
422   // <FluentSetters>
423
424   @Override /* GENERATED - do not modify */
425   public OpenApi strict() {
426      super.strict();
427      return this;
428   }
429
430   @Override /* GENERATED - do not modify */
431   public OpenApi strict(Object value) {
432      super.strict(value);
433      return this;
434   }
435
436   // </FluentSetters>
